Set the currently active model

setCurrentModel sets the given model as the currently active model.

setCurrentModel(model)

Arguments

model

a model object

Value

invisibly returns the model object

See also

Other model handlers: getCurrentModel, getLoadedModels, openCopasi

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
